title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Budget balance in billion euros, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall Budget balance in billion euros has decreased over the Year

Budget balance in billion euros is rapidly decreasing from 2014 to 2016, rapidly increasing from 2016 to 2017, roughly constant from 2017 to 2018, rapidly decreasing from 2018 to 2019, rapidly increasing from 2019 to 2020, slightly constant from 2020 to 2022, and lastly gradually increasing from 2022 to 2024.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Max Budget balance in billion euros about 7.27 was recorded at Year 2014
Min Budget balance in billion euros about 0.59 was recorded at Year 2019
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Budget balance in billion euros, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2019 to 2024.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2019.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2016.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2016 to 2017.
